statements: SELECT * FROM land_use_monitoring;
SELECT id, area_name, land_use_type FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE zone_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE change_type = 'Development' ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, land_use_type FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE zone_id = 5 AND change_type = 'Conversion';
SELECT id, area_name, change_date FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE land_use_type = 'Residential' ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM land_use_monitoring ORDER BY change_date DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, area_name, land_use_type FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE zone_id = 5 AND change_type = 'Industrial'
SELECT area_name, change_date FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE land_use_type = 'Commercial' ORDER BY area_name ASC, change_date DESC
SELECT id, area_name, change_type FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT area_name, land_use_type FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE zone_id IN (3, 7) AND change_type <> 'Residential' ORDER BY land_use_type ASC, zone_id DESC
SELECT * FROM land_use_changes;
SELECT id, location_id, land_type FROM land_use_changes ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_type = 'Residential';
SELECT id, zoning_area_id, regulation_type FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY zoning_area_id;
SELECT id, zoning_area_id, effectiveness_score FROM zoning_regulations WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM land_use_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, location_id, land_type, change_date FROM land_use_changes;
SELECT id, location_id, land_type, change_date FROM land_use_changes WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT l.id, l.location_id, l.land_type, z.regulation_type, z.effectiveness_score FROM land_use_changes l INNER JOIN zoning_regulations z ON l.location_id = z.zoning_area_id;
SELECT l.location_id, l.land_type, z.effectiveness_score FROM land_use_changes l LEFT JOIN zoning_regulations z ON l.location_id = z.zoning_area_id WHERE z.effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM land_use_monitoring;
SELECT land_type, area FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE zone_id = 3;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, assessment_result FROM policy_assessment WHERE zone_id = 5 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT zone_name, development_type FROM zoning_regulations WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reviewer_name, assessment_result FROM policy_assessment WHERE assessment_result = 'Approved' ORDER BY reviewer_name;
SELECT * FROM land_use_monitoring ORDER BY date_effective DESC;
SELECT zone_id, land_type, area FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE area > 1000;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01' AND effective_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT zoning_regulations.zone_name, land_use_monitoring.land_type, policy_assessment.assessment_result FROM zoning_regulations JOIN land_use_monitoring ON zoning_regulations.zone_id = land_use_monitoring.zone_id JOIN policy_assessment ON zoning_regulations.zone_id = policy_assessment.zone_id WHERE policy_assessment.assessment_result = 'Approved' ORDER BY zoning_regulations.zone_name ASC;
SELECT zone_id, SUM(area) AS total_area FROM land_use_monitoring GROUP BY zone_id HAVING total_area > 5000 ORDER BY total_area DESC;
SELECT * FROM land_use_changes WHERE region='North';
SELECT id, region, date FROM land_use_changes WHERE land_area > 1000;
SELECT region, land_use_type FROM land_use_changes ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE region='South' AND zoning_type='Commercial';
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM policies WHERE policy_type='Environmental' ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM land_use_changes ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT region, land_use_type, land_area FROM land_use_changes WHERE region='North';
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE zoning_type='Residential';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM land_parcels LIMIT 10;
SELECT parcel_id, parcel_area, zoning_category FROM land_parcels WHERE development_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE restriction_level = 'High' ORDER BY regulation_id DESC;
SELECT record_id, parcel_id, land_use, date FROM land_use_history WHERE parcel_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM land_parcels WHERE parcel_area > 1000 ORDER BY zoning_category ASC
SELECT parcel_id, parcel_area FROM land_parcels WHERE development_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE allowed_land_use = 'Residential' AND restriction_level = 'High'
SELECT record_id, land_use, date FROM land_use_history WHERE DATE(date) BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM evaluation_results WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 4 ORDER BY date DESC
